starvationevasion.client.GUIOrig.Popups

Class PopupManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • starvationevasion.client.GUIOrig.Popups.PopupManager

  • public class PopupManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Popup Manager is the class which handles all the logic for the popups when one is open it closes it when something else is requesting to be open
